title: murugaa muruga enDru
sahitya:
Muruga muruga enru Koovi azhithal       

        Irangi vandu arul tharayo       



anupallavi



 Parugalaam undan tayn madhura namathai  

        Arugaamal  bhavappini  irukka   



caraNam



Malai meedu vazhum murugaiyane

Mayil vaahana valli manaa lane

Kal manamillaada Karunaa karane 

        Vel piddithalum bharani deivame
